body:
Seen some good movies lately? Anyone excited for some coming out? Discuss here!

*No spoilers, please. IMDB links appreciated *

Recently I've seen:

The Equalizer: Action packed, really bloody and not for the light hearted. 

Perks Of Being A Wallflower: The movie is good as the book, I suggest everyone to watch it if they haven't already.

Imitation Game (Enigma): It is a great movie with drama and success, 9/10 would recommend. 

Kingsman: Movie came out before 50SOG therefore didn't make that much of a fame, however all things aside, great movie and I recommend it to anyone who hasn't seen it, you will laughing your arse off.

title: Movies

replies.body: I have heard such good things about San Andreas, is it worth the money? Or should I just wait for the online one?
replies.body_tagged: I have heard such good things about San Andreas, is it worth the money? Or should I just wait for the online one?

replies.body: You can already find it on "putlocker". If you are going to see anything on the movies right now, see Jurrasic park!
